name: Tiger Standard Rear Seat for Bikes

features: Nontoxic certified plastic frame, lightweight, resistant and washable
Height-adjustable backrest (8 cm – 3.1”) to accommodate the child growth
Integrated helmet slot
Soft, removable and washable seat pad
Childproof, parent-friendly safety buckle with two depth settings in the centre of the seat
Only one hand is needed to fasten and release it
Broad footrest height-setting range: 15 cm – 5.9”. Length-adjustable foot straps (4 positions)
Five-point height/length/depth-adjustable safety belts. Two shoulders height slots
Wide and comfortable seat
High sideboards to increase child support and containment
Wider and safer legs/feet side protection to avoid any contact with wheel spokes
Certified for children weighing up to 22 kg / 48.5 lb
European EN 14344 Safety Certification
Meets or exceeds the ASTM – F1625.00 Standard
Also available in Hi Viz version
Bellelli Tiger can be used with three different mounting systems:
1. On  the bike frame (Tiger Standard)
2. Reclining (10 °) (Tiger Relax)
3. On bike carriers (Tiger Clamp)
Compatible with carriers conforming to ISO 11243 - 120 to 175 mm
Now also fitting wider carriers -190 mm (E-BIKE: compatible up to 190 mm).
